Sister- Not Known ReligionHinduism HobbiesPlaying Guitar ControversiesOnce the police arrested him after seizing some pornographic videotapes from his house. He was basically arrested after three young girls filed a complaint against him as they claimed that he had abducted, raped and forced them to act in blue films. Later, all these allegations were proved to be wrong at Tamil Nadu court. Girls, Affairs and More Marital StatusMarried Affairs/GirlfriendsSirisha Wife/SpouseSirisha ChildrenSon- Not Known

Daughter- Akilaja Prathyusha

Some Lesser Known Facts About Suman

Does Suman smoke?: Not Known

Does Suman drink alcohol?: Not Known

Suman started his acting career in 1979 with the Tamil film ‘Neechal Kulam.’

Before entering the film industry, he worked as a trainer in Karate.

He is a black belt in Karate and got the first rank in it from Shotokan Karate Association.

He is the chairman of the Andhra Pradesh Karate Association and is involved with other Karate Associations as well to promote martial arts like Suman Budokan Karate Association.

He had learned ‘Kalaripayattu’, the martial art of Kerala from Gopal Gurukkal.

He had also learned Sanskrit from H.A.S. Shastri.

He is trained in playing Veena and Guitar.

Suman is an ardent admirer of hard work & perseverance qualities of N. Chandrababu Naidu.

In 1999, he joined as a supporter of the Telugu Desam Party (TDP) supremo & the chief minister N. Chandrababu Naidu.

He is fluent in different languages like Tulu, Kannada, Tamil, Telugu, and Hindi.
